resources.string: Who is the captain of the Serenity?
What is the ship classification of the Serenity?
Which of the following are names of Jayne\'s guns?
Vera is Jayne\'s favorite gun, but what fictional Clint Eastwood character is the model named after?
What is the name of the show\'s theme song?
Who sings the show\'s theme song?
Which of the following are true?
Joss Whedon took inspiration from a Pulitzer Prize winning novel while creating Firefly.
There were several Star Trek references throughout the season.
Neil Patrick Harris auditioned for the role of Shepard Book.
Zac Efron made his acting debut in Firefly.
Fox aired the Firefly episodes out of order on purpose.
Firefly was only supposed to have a cast of seven instead of nine.
Whedon took inspiration from Michael Shaara\'s \'The Killer Angels\'.
There were Star Wars references, not Star Trek. An Imperial Shuttle and a carbonite Han Solo are a few of the references.
Neil Patrick Harris actually auditioned for the role of Dr. Simon Tam.
Zac Efron, at age 13 appeared as a young Simon Tam in episode 5 \'Safe\'.
FOX felt that the pilot episode wasn\'t strong enough, so the network cherrypicked episodes out-of-order.
There were only supposed to be five characters, but during casting and development, the cast expanded to nine.
YOU\'VE TAKEN SERENITY ACROSS THE UNIVERSE ...
BUT MAKE SURE YOU DIDN\'T MISS ANYTHING FIRST
If it\'s GREEN, you answered the question
If it\'s RED, you should probably answer that question..
